title: Invisible Elder
description: Hidden for centuries, determined to live the life of her chosing.  Anastasia is old. Very old. She is much older than either Agatha or the FBI believe she is. The World Council demanded that she present herself for interrogation and she refused. Now she's running for her life. Agatha Blackmore and the entire Magical Division have been tasked with hunting her down and bringing her in. But that presents a problem of it's own. Where does a Vampire run to when half the world is searching for her?  Would her friends be the ones that would have to bring her in, dead or alive? Or could the long-ago promise of a different life be realized?
author: T.S. Paul
